entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries late this morning. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:51 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming northwest 20 overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 06:51 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
